text: The men's 100 metre backstroke S6 event at the 2016 Paralympic Games took place on 8 September, at the Olympic Aquatics Stadium. Two heats were held, both with six swimmers. The swimmers with the eight fastest times advanced to the final. ==Heats== ===Heat 1=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text- align:center" |- ! Rank ! Lane ! Name ! Nationality ! Time ! title: Swimming at the 2016 Summer Paralympics – Men's 100 metre backstroke S6
